string.value: According to #p1101002#, you can take your Knighthood Exam if you see #b#p1101005##k, the Chief Knight of the Wind. Better head over to Ereve and meet #p1101005#.

The Knighthood Exam has started. The test itself is actually quite simple. You just need to reach the end of the Training Forest, enter #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k, and defeat the Mimis inside while bringing back #t4032098#. Better find #b30 #t4032098#s#k and bring them back to #p1101005# \n\n#i4032098# #t4032098# #b#c4032098# / 30#k

You have successfully completed the Knighthood Exam and officially dropped the "in-Training" from your title. As a bonafide Cygnus Knight, do your best to work hard so you will never be ashamed of yourself.

Knighthood Exam... I suppose it's your turn to take it now. Based on your contributions to the Cygnus Knights, it only makes sense. Okay, I will grant you the right to take the Knighthood Exam. Are you ready?

The test is actually quite easy. Remember the Training Forest in which you trained back in the day? At the end of it, you'll find #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k. There, your job is to defeat the Mimis and bring back #b30 #t4032098#s#k in return.
If you can bring all the #t4032098#s, then I will grant you the right to become a Knight. At this point, I need your skills to do the talking.
If you have the slightest of hesitation, it's good to dust them off first before taking on the test.
I don't think you have brought #b30 #t4032098#s#k yet. Go to the end of the Training Forest. There, inside #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k, you'll need to find #t4032098#...
